description:
SIMPLE CONTROLS, HARDCORE CHALLENGE! 
Two buttons - that's all you need to control the spaceship. By steering the ship left or right, you will shoot at enemies - when the ship is flying straight, it will not shoot. Push left and right simultaneously to fire an alternative weapon. Simple, yet hard to master when you facing a whole horde of aliens! 

ACTION-PACKED GAMEPLAY
There's no time to rest in space - non-stop action through a unique 5 levels, each topped off with a boss fight! In battle, you can earn upgrades and new weapons that will help you along the way! 

RETRO FEEL
From gameplay to graphics, P.3 was created as a tribute to classic shmups and bullet hell games. All this is accompanied by a dynamic soundtrack! 

Features: 
- Arcade action and retro vibe
- Easy to learn controls, hard to master gameplay
- 5 Stages with boss fights 
- Many upgrades and weapon alternatives 
- Old-school graphics and pumping soundtrack
name: P.3
